definition: Chaozhou or Teochew, a town near Guangdong, with famous cuisine/Chaozhou, variant of Minnan dialect 閩南語|闽南语[Min3 nan2 yu3] spoken in east Guangdong

sentences.english: The world has "ceramics capital of China, " said the tide continent.
sentences.chinese: 在全世界有“中国瓷都”之称的潮洲。
